title: Trickery Domain
content: e a Medium or Small corpse. 3m Harm Lv 6 Necromancy Action 14-84 Damage 14d6 Necrotic Reduce a target's maximum hit points, but never below 1. Until Long Rest On Save: Targets still take half damage 18m CON Save Heal Lv 6 Evocation Action 70 Healing Heal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases.
